data.client_settings: Tested on: - Discord Canary Desktop v20088 -
data.actual_result: Number emojis don't render in code blocks and frustrates the user
data.expected_result: Number emojis are supposed to render in code blocks, other emojis work
data.short_description: Discord cannot output emoji in code blocks
data.steps_to_repro: - Use this: ```if (('`123')) {        ('1⃣')(r => {            ('2⃣')(r=> {                ('3⃣');            });        });    }``` - You will see that the emojis don't output correctly - Try to copy the 1 2 3 boxes and it will output correctly outside of the code blocks - If you copy from the code blocks above to VSC or Atom, it will show the text as it is, try Googling the 2 Emoji and paste it into Discord, VSC, and Atom, they will render it correctly, Discord cannot render the number emojis in code blocks but renders basically everything else - REMEMBER TO COPY AND REPLACE 2⃣ WITH 2️⃣
